abstract: The deal for Royal Bank of Canada’s American retail banking unit would help the PNC Financial Services Group expand into the Southeast.
snippet: The deal for Royal Bank of Canada’s American retail banking unit would help the PNC Financial Services Group expand into the Southeast.
lead_paragraph: 6:01 p.m. | Updated The PNC Financial Services Group is near a deal to buy the Royal Bank of Canada’s American consumer banking operations for about $3.45 billion in cash and stock, people briefed on the matter said on Sunday.

headline.main: PNC Is Said to Be Near $3.45 Billion Deal for R.B.C. Unit

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
